Josh Hart received a PRP (platelet-rich plasma therapy) injection to treat tendinitis in his knee and will be re-evaluated following the All-Star break.

Hart is averaging 8.5 points and 3.9 rebounds on the season. Hart shot just 22.7% from the 3-point line in January.

The NBA announced that Kevin Durant should have been called for a discontinued dribble in what turned out to be the Golden State Warriors final possession in a 120-118 win over the Miami Heat.

The Warriors hit two free throws after the missed call to win the game.
